title: New: John Joseph Brill – A Place To Drown
content:
Heard this a couple of evenings back at the end of a particularly long day, and it just really struck a chord with me.

That sense of longing and confusion that so often seeps in when tired resonates deeply throughout A Place To Drown, the latest track from Liverpool’s John Joseph Brill. Elements of Keaton Henson and Kubb (remember them?!) drift in and out, yet the track manages to embody a character entirely it’s own. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
